entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of light snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
